Description.p:
A subset of SNOMED-CT intended for use in the UK, that describes the substance being misused.
Any code from the SNOMED CT UK MisusableSubstance subset with subset original id 6091000000131.
The use of this subset is Advisory as defined in latest version of "NPFIT-ELIBR-AREL-P1R2-0178 Technical Guidance for Implementation of Templated CDA Domains."
